column4: has anyone had any luck getting the ATI closed-source drivers to work under Ubuntu?  I ask because i have yet to get decent hardware acceleration working yet, and I'm not sure where to go next :(
I tried it once, and got really good framerates but it was buggy so I had hard lockup issues when switching terminal-X and back.
what are you using now for your vid drivers, may I ask?
Stock ones from installation.  "ati" in xorg.conf
